进一步阅读的建议

SUGGESTIONS FOR FURTHER READING

  • Havi Carel，《疾病现象学》。牛津：牛津大学出版社，2016年。
  • Havi Carel, Phenomenology of Illness. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2016.
  • 安东尼·费尔南德斯、史蒂文·克罗威尔编，《当今现象学方法》。 《大陆哲学评论》特刊54，2021年，119–293。
  • Anthony Fernandez and Steven Crowell (eds.), The Phenomenological Method Today. Special issue of Continental Philosophy Review 54, 2021, 119–293.

结论

CONCLUSION

DOI：10.4324/9781003350682-17

DOI: 10.4324/9781003350682-17

史蒂文·克罗威尔（Steven Crowell）曾说过，现象学的未来前景取决于从事该领域研究的人的才能。1我认为这非常正确——而且对于哲学现象学和应用现象学。然而，我也认为，这还取决于能否清晰地表达和强化现象学事业的共同点，而不是卷入那种在不同时期困扰着现象学历史的宗派斗争。太多的精力被投入到强调内部差异上，而不是共同的优势上。

Steven Crowell once remarked that the future prospects of phenomenology will depend on the talent of those who take it up.1 I think this is quite correct – and that it holds true in the case of both philosophical phenomenology and applied phenomenology. I also think, however, that it will depend upon the ability to articulate and strengthen what is common to the phenomenological enterprise instead of getting involved in the kind of sectarian trench warfare that has regrettably plagued the history of phenomenology at various points of time. Too much energy has been devoted to highlighting internal differences, rather than common strengths.

有一段时间，现象学不再流行，被其他理论形态所取代，例如批判理论、结构主义和解构主义。然而，毫无疑问，现象学在过去二三十年间经历了某种程度的复兴。其原因有很多，但其中之一就是，人们发现，轻率地摒弃经验主体，转而关注符号系统、语言游戏、话语等等，是不够的。与普遍存在的误解相反，现象学的核心主张从来都不是，如果我们想要理解自然、历史、社会和文化领域，仅仅研究主观性就足够了。相反，这种主张是，这种研究是必要且不可或缺。如果我们想要理解我们所生活的世界，我们就需要考虑具体化、感知、思考和感受主体所扮演的角色，而现象学在这方面可以提供一些重要的帮助。

For a while, phenomenology was out of fashion, replaced and superseded by other theory formations such as critical theory, structuralism, and deconstruction. There is no question, however, that phenomenology has had something of a revival during the last 20–30 years. There are many reasons for this, but one of them is that the facile dismissal of the subject of experience in favour of a focus on sign systems, language games, discourses, etc. has been found wanting. Contrary to a widespread misunderstanding, the central claim of phenomenology has never been that an investigation of subjectivity is sufficient if we want to understand the natural, historical, social, and cultural realm. The claim was rather that such an investigation is necessary and indispensable. If we want to understand the world we are living in, we need to factor in the role played by embodied, perceiving, thinking, and feeling agents, and here phenomenology has something important to offer.

现象学远非仅仅是过去的传统，它依然鲜活，能够为当代思想做出宝贵贡献。正如《牛津当代现象学手册》2所收录的文献所示，目前许多研究工作正朝着两个方向展开：向内（向后）和向外（向前）。一方面，我们发现与古典作家的交流与对话仍在持续。胡塞尔、舍勒、斯坦因、瓦尔特、海德格尔、萨特、波伏娃、梅洛-庞蒂、列维纳斯等人的著作中蕴含的哲学资源和洞见显然尚未枯竭。另一方面，现象学与其他哲学传统和经验学科之间的对话日益增多。在我看来，现象学应该继续奉行这种双管齐下的策略。很难预测100年后会有多少自诩为现象学家的人。但我非常有信心，现象学的基本见解将继续吸引、激励有天赋的思想家。

Far from being simply a tradition of the past, phenomenology is quite alive and in a position to make valuable contributions to contemporary thought. As the contributions collected in The Oxford Handbook of Contemporary Phenomenology show,2 a lot of work is currently being done in two directions: Inward (and backward) and outward (and forward). On the one hand, we find a continuing engagement and conversation with the classical authors. The philosophical resources and insights to be found in the work of Husserl, Scheler, Stein, Walther, Heidegger, Sartre, Beauvoir, Merleau-Ponty, Levinas, etc., are evidently not yet exhausted. On the other hand, an increasing amount of dialogue is taking place between phenomenology and other philosophical traditions and empirical disciplines. In my view, phenomenology should continue to pursue this two-pronged strategy. It is hard to predict how many self-avowed phenomenologists there will be 100 years from now. But I am quite confident that the basic insights found in phenomenology will continue to appeal to and attract and inspire gifted thinkers.

笔记

NOTES

  1. Crowell, S. (2002)。是否存在现象学研究项目？Synthese 131(3): 442。
  2. Crowell, S. (2002). Is there a phenomenological research program? Synthese 131(3): 442.
  3. Zahavi, D. (编) (2012) .牛津当代现象学手册。牛津：牛津大学出版社。
  4. Zahavi, D. (ed.) (2012). The Oxford Handbook of Contemporary Phenomenology. Oxford: Oxford University Press.

进一步阅读的建议

SUGGESTIONS FOR FURTHER READING

  • Dan Zahavi 主编，《牛津当代现象学手册》。牛津：牛津大学出版社，2012 年。
  • Dan Zahavi (ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Contemporary Phenomenology. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2012.

词汇表

GLOSSARY

他性
Alterity
与众不同或不同。该术语通常指外来主体的差异性。
Being other or different. The term is often used to refer to the otherness of a foreign subject.
存在于世
Being-in-the-world
（In-der-Welt-sein ）海德格尔提出的复合术语，用来指心灵嵌入世界的特性以及心灵与世界相互交织和相互依存的程度。
(In-der-Welt-sein) A composite term introduced by Heidegger to designate the world-embedded character of the mind and the extent to which mind and world are intertwined and co-dependent.
共存（Mitsein）
Being-with (Mitsein)
海德格尔术语，旨在表达这样的观点：我们与他人的关系是我们意向存在的一个基本和决定性特征。
A Heideggerian term meant to capture the idea that our relationship with others is a fundamental and defining feature of our intentional being.
思虑
Cogitatum
思考的对象，或者更一般地说，意向对象。
The object of thought, or, more generally, the intentional object.
我思
Cogito
思考的行为，或者更一般地说，有意的行为。
The act of thinking, or, more generally, the intentional act.
计算主义
Computationalism
认为心理状态是计算状态，并且心智作为信息处理机器运作的观点。
The view that mental states are computational states, and that the mind works as an information-processing machine.
宪法
Constitution
某物（通常是物体）被揭示、披露或表现的主观过程。
The subjective process through which something (typically an object) is revealed, disclosed, or brought to manifestation.
相关性
Correlation
行为与客体、心灵与世界的依存关系。
The dependency relations between act and object, mind and world.
此在
Dasein
海德格尔用于指代意向性主体的术语。该术语由“Da”（意为“那里”）和“sein”（意为“存在”）组成，即存在或存在之所在，强调了我们的存在本身在世界中的定位和参与程度。
Heidegger’s term for the intentional subject. The term is composed of “Da”, meaning “there”, and “sein”, meaning “being”, i.e., there-being or being-there, and emphasises the extent to which our very being is to be located in and involved with the world.
本质变异
Eidetic variation
富有想象力的引导分析，旨在揭示所研究主题的基本特征。
An imaginatively guided analysis that seeks to disclose the essential features of the topic under investigation.
共情
Empathy
与另一个主体的具体和嵌入体验的体验性遭遇。
The experiential encounter with another subject’s embodied and embedded experience.
认识论
Epistemology
知识理论。
Theory of knowledge.
埃波切
Epoché
暂停或限制针对世界的某种教条（自然）态度，例如，我们相信世界的存在不依赖于思想。
The suspension or bracketing of a certain dogmatic (natural) attitude vis-à-vis the world, e.g., our belief in the mind-independent existence of the world.
本质主义
Essentialism
认为一个实体具有一组对其身份至关重要的不变特征，这些特征决定了它是什么，并且如果实体缺少这些特征，它就不再是那种实体。
The idea that an entity has a certain set of invariant features that are essential to its identity, which makes it what it is, and which it cannot lack without ceasing to be that kind of entity.
事实性
Facticity
人类存在、自然、历史的偶然性；无法通过纯粹的推理推断或证明的偶然性。
The contingency of human existence, nature, history; that which cannot be deduced or justified by pure reasoning.
历史性
Historicity
人类存在的基本历史特征；人类的理解不仅仅是暂时的，而且还处于历史背景和传统之中。
The fundamental historical character of human existence; the fact that human understanding isn’t merely temporal, but also situated in a historical context and tradition.
地平线
Horizon
任何经验对象所处的背景或语境。它让人感觉到，关于任何对象，总有比实际给出的内容更多的东西有待发现或理解。
The background or context within which any object of experience is situated. It provides the sense that there is always more to be discovered or understood about any object than that which is actually given.
唯心主义
Idealism
该术语具有许多不同的含义和定义，在这里主要用于指现实在某种意义上依赖于思想的观点。
The term has many different meanings and definitions, and is here primarily used to refer to the view that reality is in some sense mind-dependent.
具体方法
Idiographic approach
关注个别案例和特定事件（而不是基本特征或普遍规律）。
A focus on individual cases and particular events (rather than on essential features or universal laws).
意向性
Intentionality
意识的特点是属于某物、关于某物或针对某物。
The idea that consciousness is characterised by being of, or about, or directed at something.
主体间性
Intersubjectivity
主体之间的关系。
The relation between subjects.
科尔佩尔
Körper
物理和生物体；身体被视为属于自然的物理对象。
The physical and biological body; the body considered as a physical object that belongs to nature.
莱布
Leib
生活和经历的身体；主观经历的身体。
The lived and experienced body; the body as subjectively lived through.
生活世界
Lifeworld
我们生活的世界，是我们在日常生活中习以为常的前理论经验世界。
The world we live in, the pre-theoretical world of experience we take for granted in daily life.
形而上学
Metaphysics
一个含义丰富的术语。在此，它主要用于表达对现实是否独立于心智的关注。
A term with many meanings. Here, primarily used to designate a concern with whether or not reality is mind-independent.
共同世界
Mitwelt
舒茨使用的概念，指的是我们同时代人的世界，即与我们同时存在，但并不在我们身边的人。
A notion used by Schutz to designate the world of our contemporaries, i.e., those that exist simultaneously with us, but who are not bodily present in our immediate vicinity.
自然态度
Natural attitude
普遍存在的前哲学假设是，世界是理所当然的，并且独立于我们而存在。
The pervasive pre-philosophical assumption that the world can be taken for granted and exists independently of us.
自然主义
Naturalism
认为一切存在的事物都可以用自然科学的方法进行研究，并归结为自然科学事实。
The idea that everything that exists can be studied by the methods of natural science and be reduced to natural-scientific facts.
神经现象学
Neurophenomenology
建议将现象学形式的研究纳入意识神经科学研究的实验方案中。
The proposal that one should incorporate phenomenological forms of investigation into the experimental protocols of neuroscientific research on consciousness.
客观主义
Objectivism
这种观点认为，现实是完全独立于任何体验者而存在的，我们对现实的认知理解充其量只是对独立于心智的世界的忠实反映。
The view that reality is what it is completely independently of any experiencer, and that our cognitive apprehension of reality is at best a faithful mirroring of a mind-independent world.
本体
Ontology
对现实基本特征的研究。
The study of the fundamental features of reality.
生成现象学
Phenomenology, generative
研究跨代、历史和社会文化因素的构成作用，例如前几代人的构成成就如何影响我们的个人经历。
A study of the constitutive role of transgenerational, historical, and sociocultural factors, e.g., how the constitutive accomplishments of previous generations affect our individual experiences.
现象学、遗传学
Phenomenology, genetic
对行为和对象之间相关性的研究，考察不同形式的意向性的时间形成。
A study of the correlation between act and object that examines the temporal becoming of different forms of intentionality.
静态现象学
Phenomenology, static
不考虑起源和发展，研究行为与客体之间的相互关系。
A study of the correlation between act and object that disregards origin and development.
图像意向性
Pictorial intentionality
我们对图片以及图片所描绘内容的认识。
Our awareness of pictures and of what they depict.
现成的
Present-at-hand
当我们采取理论或旁观的态度时，我们所遇到的事情。
That which we encounter when we adopt a theoretical or spectatorial attitude.
本体感觉
Proprioception
我对四肢和整体姿势的位置感。正是这种感觉让我不用看腿就能知道自己是否交叉了。
The position sense that I have with respect to my limbs and overall posture. It is the sense that allows me to know whether my legs are crossed, or not, without looking at them.
即用型
Ready-to-hand
在进行任何理论化或独立观察之前，我们在实际关注和参与中可以获得的东西。
That which is available to us in our practical concerns and engagement, prior to any theorising or detached observation.
还原，遗迹
Reduction, eidetic
揭示所讨论主题的基本特征。
The laying bare of the essential features of the topic under consideration.
还原，超越
Reduction, transcendental
对意识的构成功能以及心灵和世界如何构成地相互关联的系统分析。
The systematic analysis of the constitutive function of consciousness, of how mind and world are constitutively interrelated.
还原论
Reductionism
我们可以而且应该用更简单、更基本的属性来解释某种现象或属性。
The idea that we can and should explain a certain phenomenon or property in terms of simpler and more basic properties.
表征主义
Representationalism
该观点认为，我们对现实的认知在某种程度上受到表象的影响。
The view that our cognitive access to reality is in some way mediated by representations.
科学主义
Scientism
认为自然科学的方法是认识世界的唯一手段，不能用自然科学所接受的术语捕捉的实体是不存在的。
The view that the methods of natural science provide the sole means of epistemic access to the world, and that entities that cannot be captured in terms accepted by natural science are non-existent.
沉降
Sedimentation
经验中获得的东西如何稳定下来、成为习惯，并为未来的经验提供信息、实现和限制。
The way in which that which is acquired in experience settles down, becomes habitualised, and informs, enables, and constrains future experiences.
知识社会学
Sociology of knowledge
研究不同类型知识的形成、维持和分布或分层的社会条件。
The study of the societal conditions for the formation, maintenance, and distribution or stratification of diverse types of knowledge.
心智理论
Theory of mind
我们对他人心理生活的理解本质上是推论性的，并且由某种（心理学）理论实现。
The idea that our understanding of the psychological life of others is inferential in nature and enabled by some kind of (psychological) theory.
先验哲学
Transcendental philosophy
系统地关注客观性的可能性（主观）条件。
A systematic concern with the (subjective) conditions of possibility for objectivity.
典型化
Typification
个人通过将人、物体或过程分类或分组为特定类别来理解社会世界的过程。
the process by which individuals make sense of the social world by classifying or grouping people, objects, or processes into specific categories.
环境世界
Umwelt
我们周围的世界。
The world of our immediate surroundings.
